website_summaries.verdict: Ultra-light kinesiology tape that provides great strength with an elasticity level close to skin's.
pros: Provides support and pain relief to muscles, joints, tendons
Can be worn for several consecutive days, including while swimming or showering
Offers precut 10" strips, convenient to apply and use

customer_reviews.title: This company is also selling you a product at a great competitive price
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitis and use this almost daily...this has been one of the only things that bring me instant relief.....if I follow through with a daily regimen and stick with it, this works 100%. This company is also selling you a product at a great competitive price. Go to KT tapes website and search plantar fasciitis. Follow their instructions on how to tape your foot.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary A.

customer_reviews.title: We cant live without our KT Tape.
customer_reviews.text: We cant live without our KT Tape. it helps us with all of our aches and pains. If you go the the KT Tape website you can find all of the videos to learn how to apply this for any of your needs. We use to buy this in a local running store, but the price went from $10 a roll for 20 pcs to $20 a roll. I did my usual "help me Amazon find a better deal" and sure enough the BIG A came through. The 160 pcs roll comes out to around 0.40 cents a strip, less that 1/2 that of the retail outlets. Got aches and pains? Give KT Tape a try.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this same product since February 2017. My last two purchases were June 2018 and July 2018, one of my Dad and then last for me. We are VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!! The tape is not holding and it is much thinner. My Dad had a left over roll from 2017 and there is a BIG difference, the color, texture, thinness and eventually the glue because it is not holding.
customer_reviews.author: J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. I use it for Plantar Faciitis and an arthritic knee. I have never felt such relief on my foot and it keeps getting better. I do believe this tape is helping it heal. - This works far better than any brace I have ever used. It never feels too tight and it never falls down. I work in a theme park that hosts a lot of marathons. One day I stopped a someone with this funky tape on their knees and asked if it really works. I got a resounding, "YES!" I agree. I'm not a runner, but my knee sure feels better when I use it. I do recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This either is not the real thing or got a bad lot. End of first day of using and ...
customer_reviews.text: Ive been uaing KT tape for a while now, figuredI would buy in bulk instead of the packs I nor ally buy at the store which are smaller. This either is not the real thing or got a bad lot. End of first day of using and the tape is peeling off, didnt even wet it or sweat with it (was wearing jeans, but not first time I do with KT tape). Ill be giving it another try to see.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Amastha

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP KNOCKOFF DONT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this zero stars if I could. One it is misleading advertising. This is NOT Kineso-tape. This is a cheap knock off and don't buy it. The tape doesn't even hold for a few hours. This product should be taken off amazon. As a health care practitioner, I am deeply disappointed in this cheap stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen McReynolds

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I use it regularly on my gimpy knee when playing tennis. Online product videos show a variety of easy to follow instruction for various parts of the body. An application will last up to 5 days if you are careful. It usually comes loose at the ends first. I wear a knee sleeve over it when showering and in bed to help protect it. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Noneya

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, easy to apply and effective!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, easy to apply, and works very effectively. My son has been battling elbow and wrist issues for six months now and this tape has worked the absolute best. This was recommended by his physical therapist!
customer_reviews.author: Luvmypenguins

customer_reviews.title: Really helped my knee pain!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the KT tape for approx. 1 month. A friend suggested I use the tape to help with knee pain I was experiencing while bowling. (I had surgery for a torn meniscus approx. 18 months ago, and continued to experience pain just below the knee cap on the inside of my leg adjacent to my knee.) The tape has worked wonders! Now I also wear it when I know I will be walking a lot and when I am bicycling. I am happy to say I am pain free while wearing the tape!
customer_reviews.author: BLL

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Use it in my office. Let’s just say I haven’t found a tape that works for everyone. Some people it comes off easily and some people find that it irritates their skin. But to me it seems like this one does it less than others. So I like it. And no, there is no perfect glue for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Capstone C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and if you use it often, buying in bulk is a great way to lower on-going costs!
customer_reviews.text: If you use this tape, this is a great way to buy it at a discount rate. I've used KT tape for two years now and very satisfied. I have a very bad ankle, and this allows me to do most activities to as normal of a level as possible. Without it, I wouldn't be able to do nearly what I've been able to do with it. Example: Without the tape, playing golf using a cart, my ankle would start to give out at hole number 12 or 13. Using 4 or 5 strips of this tape to support my ankle. I'm able to play a full round of golf with NO issues at all.....love it!
customer_reviews.author: dssman96

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works!
customer_reviews.text: This tape is amazing! I use it while running and cycling. It stays on for up to 4 days and minimizes muscle tightness and fatigue. I use it during my triathlon training. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Amble

customer_reviews.title: Defective roll?
customer_reviews.text: I'm returning the remaining portion of this roll. I loved the tape from the standard roll I got previously, but this stuff won't even last overnight without peeling. I don't know if beige is fundamentally defective or if I got counterfeit tape, but this stuff feels different from the black I have. It's shinier. I'm going to try one more time with another color since so many of the other reviews are glowing and hope this was just a bad roll.
customer_reviews.author: Carson Lutchansky

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but make sure it's the most 'up to date' version
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great, really appreciate the videos online for how to wrap different areas. However, this kind, weather it's an older incarnation or what, doesn't have the 'anchor points' to hold the tape as you apply, which can make it tricky. Several times I've had a piece become unusable after I'd mucked it up by holding the actual sticky part. Just comething to be aware of.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: KT TAPE IS SAVING MY KNEE AND KEEPING ME MOBILE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! Years ago I had arthriscopic surgery on my right knee. They snipped out a large chunk of torn meniscus, which created a void in the support system of my knee. Since then my knee joint slides into the hole and gets stuck. It is so painful I can't put weight on that leg. My Chiro is the only one who can put the joint back where it belongs. Since I discovered KT Tape, I keep that knee taped to prevent that from happening. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Reiland

customer_reviews.title: I’m a physical therapist and this tape is hands down ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m a physical therapist and this tape is hands down miraculous. I have had a few clients buying this tape after I instructed them how to tape it. The U tube is a vital element for others to use it, I have used also other methods than described In the video.. It does not work as well on areas of a lot of fat, as there is a lot of tissue sliding.
customer_reviews.author: janneke huber

customer_reviews.title: Must have for sports
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver. My kids play select ball. This works better than taping because it allows more movement but yet gives great support. We also used it for hyperflexed thumbs, brace for a week then taping when playing no pain, beat 6 weeks in a brace.. Our Dr didn't believe us until we showed him.. this is a must have for anyone that is active..
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: This is the real deal. It's rather large, ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal. It's rather large, so keep your smaller tape-case if you travel with your tape. My advice: First, shave. Second, buy benzoin. You can get in spray bottles. The benzoin swabs are less effective. Go to the company website for videos etc on how to apply. I'm an MD and was skeptical that this worked, but I figured, how could 1000 olympians be wrong. IT WORKS!! I've used it for a knee, a back, a strained achilles, and an achilles.
customer_reviews.author: Weir Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: I Love KT tape!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love KT Tape! Been using it for years! I’m not a “Spring Chicken” and an avid Tennis Player so there’s always some ache or pain. KT tape helps me get out on the court and play painlessly! Totally recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Les and Susan Hansen

customer_reviews.title: KT tape Pro
customer_reviews.text: I had 2 knee surgeries, these were great to make it through teraphy. Also, when knee gives me pain, I use for a couple of days to get back into less pain.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: I like the tape -- my problem is how difficult it ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the tape -- my problem is how difficult it is to get the tape to not roll once applied on the ends. I have not figured out an answer to this, but it is annoying. In all fairness, the problem is my knee that I am taping and we all know that knees can be real problems. So I ask that you take it with a grain of salt. Of all the Kinesiology tapes I have tried, I will say that I like KT brand best. It does leave more of a residue on my skin than the others, but the support I receive while wearing it is worth the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Anne F. Skipper

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product in the past. If you go to KT site or YouTube there’s great instruction for applying for different issues.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph V.

customer_reviews.title: I have always loved KT Tape
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved KT Tape! I am training for the Marathon and thought I should buy the bulk size tape. Unfortunately some of the tape isn't sticking as well as on some strips as it is others. My strips used to last 5 days (depending on my activity level), and now some barely last after the initial application up to 1 day. Otherwise, when the adhesive IS working, it works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: The paper back on this size roll was sticking to ...
customer_reviews.text: The paper back on this size roll was sticking to odd areas on backsides of tape & it was impossible to peel it off along edges. I've been using the small rolls for 2 years on same knee & had zero problems. Amazon replaced it with same product, different company. Same price & size. This is the reason I stick with amazon. No problem with replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Great tape!
customer_reviews.text: Im so happy I ordered this in bulk. I use this at my massage therapy business and it’s my favorite KT tape. I usually will buy the regular sized rolls but found that I was constantly restocking this. Im so happy that I can now buy in bulk size!
customer_reviews.author: BritBeeTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great price, regular strength
customer_reviews.text: Bulk price great for someone who uses a lot of them. They aren’t the KT pro strength, but they make due.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Crowthers

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but well worth the price for your aches and pains.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job as described although the quality from product to product seems inconsistent...mainly from how the stretch of the tape is.
customer_reviews.author: Phil77

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: This tape has allowed me to go walking again. I am 62 and my knee hurt soooo bad all the time. I went to a doctor and to physical therapy. Finally the Physical Therapists told me to use this tape and it's almost a miracle!!! I walk 5 miles almost every other day and it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Walking normally again!
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my plantar facia and it is working great. They have taping instructions online for most types of injuries. I've had more success taping differently with just one strip pulled firmly on the arch but this has helped stop my pain! I now only tape one day a week and it is allowing me to wear flip-flops again. This along with moderate compression socks in the winter have stopped my months of pain!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: I buy this product all the time. I've only had two "wrong product shipped" issues. The first time was the wrong material - there is synthetic and cloth. We always buy the synthetic and we got cloth. We always buy beige and this time we got black. So, overall good product. Just a couple times didn't exactly receive what we ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Jyller

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with KT tape brand
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with KT tape brand. I have bought other brand before and it last for a few more days after I shower. But, with this one- it starts to peel off the same day.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy top apply and works as promised. Use it every time I golf!
customer_reviews.author: VRG

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! I have knee pain and braces wouldn't stay in place. The tape gives good support and stays put! I can walk without discomfort!
customer_reviews.author: E. Buck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses these to stabilize her patella. She prefers this over a patella holder to relieve and prevent patellar tendonitis. This color perfectly blends to her skin tone, the tape becomes invisible on pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Katharina

customer_reviews.title: I love KT Tape
customer_reviews.text: I love KT Tape, but hated having to buy all the little rolls. I use it often to prevent knee pain from hyper mobile patellas. It provides enough structure, while still giving me full range of motion, which was a difficulty I have had with braces. It can be tricky trying to remove it (baby oil or coconut oil usually does the trick) but it lasts for days.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Suggested by two physical therapists. Usually effective. Expensive. Haven’t tried the cheaper ones but I hear they are not as useful.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works. I have blown out both my ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works. I have blown out both my elbows after years of lifting weights, playing all sorts of sports and physical work. Woke up one morning and couldn't hardly pick up my coffee cup. First ordered the cotton, which doesn't last but a couple of days then ordered this. It has lasted me up to a week while working outside in the yard, using power tools including wielding my chain saw for hours. I don't do anything physical without it. Will buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Stephen B Richardson

customer_reviews.title: KT Tape Pro is the best.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Elastic Kinesiology tapes for several years. I have used every manufacturer available. The KT Tape Pro is by farnthe best. It stays stuck on your skin for many days.
customer_reviews.author: William Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Arrived within the stated time but after using them for ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived within the stated time but after using them for several months I’ve noticed they have some issues staying in place when sweaty or in a high movement area.
customer_reviews.author: Dignow DXB

customer_reviews.title: Very well satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.text: The delivery date of the product was excellent!! I have used this product before and decided last year to buy the larger size. it worked just as well as the 20-strip box. I use it on my knees and my back for pain relief and support. it stays on until i remove it.
customer_reviews.author: juanita

customer_reviews.title: ... a long time but this particular one is very poor quality. I usually buy the smaller rolls but ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for a long time but this particular one is very poor quality. I usually buy the smaller rolls but I thought this time I should save and just getbit in bulk. The tape is not sticking properly. I am quite familiar with how it should work and this one does not do it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my KT Tape!
customer_reviews.text: Recommend and share my KT tape at least a few days a week to family, friends and coworkers...I should be paid as a sales rep by KT, lol. Can be on the expensive side...reason for a 4 star rating instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer LB

customer_reviews.title: great video has posted on the company's website to show ...
customer_reviews.text: My kid used this every time for ballet lesson for the injured ankle, great video has posted on the company's website to show you how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Quincy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the tape does not adhere as well as the smaller rolls.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Quality, quantity and value for money on this tape is best.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Morris

customer_reviews.title: Old defective adhesive
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if old or defective, but the adhesive doesn't work as well as the smaller packs bought from the local pharmacy. Feels like it's old stock that's sat in a warehouse too long. Would have been great if it matched the usual quality of the products.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Koncilja

customer_reviews.title: One day use only....
customer_reviews.text: I used the authentic KT tapes before. The real ones can easily stay on your skin for 5 days, but this one is one-day use. It peels off or loses its elasticity after one day. Yes, it's rather cheap! The price is only half of what I used to pay before. If you are looking for tapes that only need to stay on your body for one day, it's a good buy. Otherwise it's not worth it. Honestly, I don't know if this is originally manufactured by KT Tapes or not, but it surely looked exactly like KT Tape.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: Product has plenty for a soccer season and works well. Will continue to buy
customer_reviews.author: Matt Elison

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay on
customer_reviews.text: This was ordered by a staff member and I find it useless. It is hard and does not stay on. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: DrE

customer_reviews.title: Great help with knees.
customer_reviews.text: Use all the time for knee support. Have used this product for over 2 years. Better buy this way. 7 rolls for the price 4-5 rolls in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... to use this everyday for an injury so I'm glad I don't need to buy a bunch of small ...
customer_reviews.text: I have to use this everyday for an injury so I'm glad I don't need to buy a bunch of small rolls anymore. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really stays on!!!
customer_reviews.text: It stays on for a long period of time as long as the skin is cleaned with alcohol first. We use it for knee swelling and tracking, shoulder and ankle dysfunctions primarily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My therapist was using similar tape that wasn't proportioned and having a terrible time peeling off the backing
customer_reviews.text: I reordered more in the larger roll.. My therapist was using similar tape that wasn't proportioned and having a terrible time peeling off the backing. He loves this, especially after I showed him how to break the backing to get hold of the tape--a trick I saw on the video demonstration.
customer_reviews.author: A. Park

customer_reviews.title: I've enjoyed the first box tremendously and hence this re-purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd box of 150 strips KT Tape i've ordered. Somehow this the quality of the tape this round is far inferior from the first box. The fabric of the tape is noticeably thinner and much less elastic. Tape came off during my run on 4 consecutive runs with 4 different tapes. I've enjoyed the first box tremendously and hence this re-purchase. Its a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Lena Lim-Newing

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Use everyday for heel support. Dispenser works easily. Storage is easy. This is a good solid product.
customer_reviews.author: B. McClain

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, excellent product and love the 10 inch pre-cut sections.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Bowser

customer_reviews.title: Does not stick well
customer_reviews.text: This particular box of KT Tape Pro does not stick as securely as other rolls of KT Pro tape I have purchased. I can't tell you why, but the roll I received does not stay in place. I usually have to removed and retape every 1 -2 days.
customer_reviews.author: DBShaw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought for my sister and she gets a lot of pain relief in her shoulder...
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Actually helps for pain!!
customer_reviews.text: Sticks awesome!! Actually rips hair out when you remove it and works great for my pain! I give this a 10!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: BEST THING EVER
customer_reviews.text: This tape has saved my tendon insertion sites, which are chronically inflamed due to rheumatoid arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This great to have if you go through the a lot
customer_reviews.text: I use enough of these. This great to have if you go through the a lot. Only down side, if you have hairy legs/arms like I do, you're not going to have a good time taking it off.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Definitely better then the knee brace that my daughter had been ...
customer_reviews.text: Works extremely well. Definitely better then the knee brace that my daughter had been using. Love that it can be thrown out after use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: 3 in family already used on swollen feet & sore big toe strain, arm/elbow area strain and Knee pain to reduce pain significantly. This roll will last and great Family purchase! Not sure how to use, many Youtube videos with explanations.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey F.

customer_reviews.title: Long run days
customer_reviews.text: Helped me on my half marathon training and race day for my knees and feet. Great for long distance runners. Love the giant roll cost wise.
customer_reviews.author: Gleon

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product.. I have a number of sore muscles that without this tape I would not be able to play tennis six times a week. It is a life changer for me. I have used other products and not one comes close to helping me stay on the tennis courts as long as KT Tape. I have a hamstring, knee and shoulder injury and I tape all the sore areas and I am good to go and play the game I love.
customer_reviews.author: Kat L

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this size container
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this size container. My mom and I go through this so fast with our bad needs and joints and this stuff helps so much
customer_reviews.author: Jessica N Brown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived sooner than we expected. We are very pleased and will be ordering again for sure! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Martin

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This tape does not stick well and I have use alcohol wipes and cleaned the skin
customer_reviews.author: John E.  Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I wish I would have know about this tape sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Need run out of tape!
customer_reviews.text: Love KT and this was a great way to save some money.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy juriga

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What a difference this makes.. Watch utube for videos on how to...
customer_reviews.author: NC Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great product at great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product at great price. Easy to use and really helps support my knee post surgery. Helpful instructional videos on how to apply are available on youtube.
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: The tape stays on well and keeps my sore tendon ...
customer_reviews.text: The tape stays on well and keeps my sore tendon from getting cold and keeps it supported. The price is 1/3 of what I paid in the sporting goods store.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Kaye

customer_reviews.title: KT tape works
customer_reviews.text: KT tape is very effective. Watch the video to learn how to use it most effectively. It has helped me manage my knee pain.
customer_reviews.author: Psl

customer_reviews.title: Gray Kinesiology Tape
customer_reviews.text: A great product to help support injured areas. Thick and durable. Stays on well go to YouTube to learn how to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: This tape is absolutely amazing. It is the ONLY thing that has brought relief to my swollen Achilles' tendons. Delivery was super fast too! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Witt

customer_reviews.title: The KT Tape Pro works well, as advertised. ...
customer_reviews.text: The KT Tape Pro works well, as advertised. The only problem with my order was that I received black tape instead of beige. Due to the fact that I needed it right away, I did not make a big deal of it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Weidenbach

customer_reviews.title: reliable
customer_reviews.text: The product meets my expectation I am very satisfied with it
customer_reviews.author: Guy Moshe

customer_reviews.title: Solid staple in our sporty household!
customer_reviews.text: It would be awesome if it taped to itself better so anchors weren't so important, but for Kinesiology Tape, it is as good as it gets!
customer_reviews.author: heather chiu

customer_reviews.title: lack of good adhesive
customer_reviews.text: I have used other brands, worked better. this product did not adhere as well as others
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works very well on tough skin, but it ripped some skin near butt and hip. Ouch!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this tape! The skin color is awesome and the large size is ideal if you use it frequently like I do! Fast shipping and always high quality!
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: It worked as expected. I have had five surgeries ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked as expected. I have had five surgeries on my hips over the past 25 years. The last one was in 2014 which has been the hardest to recover from because of the scar tissue. The KT tape makes it possible for me to walk pain free.
customer_reviews.author: mary castle

customer_reviews.title: No adhesion
customer_reviews.text: These tapes are not sticking and not useable. Are there any options for a credit??
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Urias

customer_reviews.title: and this one is by far the best! Easiest to apply
customer_reviews.text: I have tried every kinesiology tape out there, and this one is by far the best! Easiest to apply, and it's the only one that truly stays on! Spend your money on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Play like a Pro
customer_reviews.text: Works great for posture and for pain. Love working with KT tape. Easy to use. I really like the price speacially when it is for a clinic roll of pre cuts. Other rolls like this is almost $200 with shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Miracle
customer_reviews.text: After becoming a long distance runner after a career as a ballarina and moder dancer, KT is a miracle for my knees! So happy to find suck a large roll of it so I, not having to buy more every other week!
customer_reviews.author: Alayna Pinion

customer_reviews.title: Provides stability
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for the additional stability necessary during training. There are easy to follow instructions so you can see just how to apply it for your particular injury or stress.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Horsley

customer_reviews.title: Great Support but annoy me on peeling off easily
customer_reviews.text: Want to know how to avoid peeling off (especially in hot weather)...
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Yau

customer_reviews.title: Good sticky KT Tape.
customer_reviews.text: Works prefect. This tape sticks really good, even when wet.
customer_reviews.author: PJ 17

customer_reviews.title: ... ordered this KT tape because of my physical therapist recommended it. I like how it stays in place
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this KT tape because of my physical therapist recommended it. I like how it stays in place, even when I sweat or get it wet. I'm impressed by this tape and I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Alexander

customer_reviews.title: This is great tape and it does a terrific job - use it all the time!
customer_reviews.text: Use this to wrap my knee when dancing - had ACL surgery several years ago - good repair but still needs support - KT tape does the a great job -
customer_reviews.author: carlsbad2

customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stick very well, and by the end of 1 exercise stint, it's falling off. Beige is worthless.

customer_reviews.text: It helped to relieve the pain from strained knee tendons and added some support. I recommend this product.

customer_reviews.text: The tape is easy to use, website has great instructions. Tape is water resistent and stays in place well. It also helps with pain!!

product_meta.title: KT TAPE PRO Synthetic Elastic Kinesiology Therapeutic Tape
product_meta.description: KT TAPE PRO is the latest breakthrough in light elastic taping. The synthetic fibers are performance engineered with a larger elastic core. KT TAPE PRO last longer and works harder to keep you in the game. KT TAPE PRO features a stronger adhesive, quicker drying fibers, and a reflective pattern for increased safety when running or biking in low light conditions. KT (Kinesiology Therapeutic) Tape is a strong, elastic athletic tape that reduces muscle pain, increases mobility, and enhances athletic performance. KT Tape provides relief and support for muscles and joints and can be used to prevent or treat hundreds of sports injuries. Kinesiology tape, treatments, and application techniques have been used by healthcare professionals such as orthopedics, chiropractors, physical therapists and athletic trainers for over thirty years. KT Tape is the first brand of kinesiology tape ever to be offered directly to consumers and is widely adopted by healthcare professionals and sports teams.
feature_bullets: WHAT IS KT TAPE? – Elastic sports tape used by pro and serious athletes to support muscles, joints, tendons, and ligaments. It’s drug-free, latex-free, hypoallergenic, lightweight, breathable, comfortable, HSA/FSA approved, and easy to use.

HIGHEST QUALITY – Don’t be fooled by other brands. KT Tape PRO is the only brand with 100% synthetic-engineered, performance fabric that maintains elasticity twice as long (up to 7 days) as cotton tape. It wicks moisture instead of absorbing it.

HOW DOES IT WORK? – It helps reduce tissue pressure and support muscles and joints. Studies show it helps you recover faster from pain. Used for knee pain, shoulder pain, shin splints, back pain, and much more. Watch our videos to easily apply.

TRUSTED BY PROFESSIONALS – Relied on by professional and Olympic athletes, athletic trainers, and medical professionals to train longer and finish stronger. Used heavily by Team USA, NBA Trainers Association, US Soccer, USA Triathlon, and more.
